::CyberShark::

    He ran up to Battera when she called his name. He held =
her with his only hand. (His other is a blade) He looked at her. Then he lo=
oked a Vulois, they both seemed to be having nightmares. He wondered if he =
should pull the plug.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: logomorph@hot=
mail.com 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, October 26, 2000 6:20=
 AM
  Subject: Back at the bat cave.......


  Battera::

  She was slumped=
 over as she sat on the ground.  Her data banks were 
  running on high, tr=
ansfering the information to Vulios.  She dreamed 
  that she was walking d=
own a path in the forest.  She saw Cybershark 
  standing there.  He stood =
there, then turned and walked away.  She 
  She ran after him, calling to h=
im.  She was about to catch up to him, 
  when he dissappeared.  She called=
 out,"CyberShark!"  But heard only 
  her own echo bouncing around in the f=
orest.  

  She muttered in her sleep,"CyberShark..."

  She then turned an=
d saw Vulios.  She called out to him too, but he 
  dissappeared into the m=
ist of the forest.  She turned and saw Hell 
  Beast there, right next to h=
er.  She screamed and tried to run, but 
  he reached out and caught her.  =
The next thing she knew, she had a 
  collar around her neck.  And Hell Bea=
st was holding the leash that 
  connected to her collar.  She was sitting =
next to Hell Beast as he 
  sat on a throne made of transformer parts.  She=
 was a prisoner, her 
  worst nightmare was unfolding before her.  She was =
forsed to look on 
  as Hell Beast had CyberShark and Vulois in cages, dang=
ling over a pit 
  of molten lava. She pleaded and begged, but Hell Beast j=
ust laughed.  
  Hell Beast told her that for her leaving him in the first =
place, it 
  would cost her the lives of her friends.  She tried to fly up,=
 but 
  Hell Beast pulled on the leash and she fell to the ground, in front=
 
  of Hell Beast.   She pleaded again for the life of her friends.  She 
 =
 looked at Cybershark.  She looked, and he was staring back at her.  
  She=
 blinked and then instead of cybershark, it was a dead, decaying 
  form of=
 him.  THe same with Vulios.  She saw thier rotting corpses in 
  the cages=
 with Hell Beast tugging  on her leash, and laughing at her.
  She started =
to cry at the site of her dead friends. 

  She started to cry in her sleep=
.


        eGroups Sponsor
